contributionDescription: I can share OP with X in my community, and I will drive my fans to participate in the OP ecology and build it together. This is what I have always wanted to do, and now I just have this opportunity to participate, so I want to seize it and contribute to the future of OP together!
impactDescription: I can share OP with X in my community, and I will drive my fans to participate in the OP ecology and build it together. This is what I have always wanted to do, and now I just have this opportunity to participate, so I want to seize it and contribute to the future of OP together!
pwCategorySuggestions: Collective Governance, End User Experience and Adoption
pwFlaggedReason: This application should be flagged because it violates rule 1 by making promises of future impact which is not allowed in the grant application.
